data.comment: The match is underway in Burnley.
Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Sheffield.
In the minute 2, Burnley's Ashley Barnes gets in a shot on goal at Turf Moor. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
Throw-in Sheffield.
In the minute 4, Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Burnley.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Attention is being given to Burnleyâ€™s Charlie Taylor and play has been suspended briefly.
Josh Benson (Burnley) has replaced the possibly injured Charlie Taylor at Turf Moor.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Burnley.
Chris Kavanagh awards Sheffield a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Burnley is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
Goal kick for Burnley at Turf Moor.
In the minute 15, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Chris Kavanagh awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 17, Chris Kavanagh signals a Sheffield throw-in in Burnley's half.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Burnley advance rapidly upfield but Chris Kavanagh blows for offside.
Free kick for Sheffield in the half of Burnley.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Burnley.
Burnley have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Sheffield in Burnley.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Burnley.
Throw-in for Burnley close to the penalty box.
In the minute 29, Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Lys Mousset (Sheffield) strikes at Turf Moor but his header is cleared.
In Burnley, Sheffield push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Burnley at Turf Moor.
Burnley push forward at Turf Moor and Chris Wood gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Sheffield defence.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
In the minute 32, Goal! Burnley take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Ben Mee.
Robbie Brady with an assist there.
The match at Turf Moor has been interrupted briefly for a check on James Tarkowski, who is down injured.
In the minute 35, Rhian Brewster gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sheffield.
James Tarkowski for Burnley is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Sheffield at Turf Moor.
In the minute 36, Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Burnley are in shooting range from this free kick.
Burnley are pushing forward but Robbie Brady's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 37, Chris Kavanagh awards Sheffield a goal kick.
David McGoldrick (Sheffield) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Burnley needs to be cautious. Sheffield have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Burnley have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Sheffield push upfield but Chris Kavanagh quickly pulls them for offside.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
In the minute 45, In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first-half is over.
At Turf Moor, Matthew Lowton has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 46, Chris Kavanagh has blown to start the second-half.
Can Sheffield capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Burnley's half?
Free kick Sheffield.
In the minute 48, Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sheffield pushes forward through David McGoldrick, whose finish on goal is saved.
Chris Kavanagh signals a throw-in for Sheffield, close to Burnley's area.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Burnley in the half of Sheffield.
Ben Mee (Burnley) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
In the minute 54, Burnley have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Sheffield needs to be cautious. Burnley have an attacking throw-in.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 56, Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
The away team replace Jack Robinson with John Fleck.
Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Burnley.
Oliver Burke is replacing Lys Mousset for Sheffield at Turf Moor.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Chris Kavanagh signals a Sheffield throw-in in Burnley's half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 67, Chris Wilder (Sheffield) is making a third substitution, with Oliver Norwood replacing Ethan Ampadu.
Throw-in for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Burnley at Turf Moor.
Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Burnley.
Throw-in high up the field for Sheffield in Burnley.
In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 72, Enda Stevens (Sheffield) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 73, Free kick Burnley.
Free kick for Sheffield in the half of Burnley.
Throw-in for Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 75, George Baldock (Sheffield) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
John Egan for Sheffield gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the home team in Burnley.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Burnley.
Throw-in for Sheffield at Turf Moor.
In the minute 78, At Turf Moor, Burnley are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Burnley.
The home team have replaced Ashley Barnes with Dale Stephens. This is the second substitution made today by Sean Dyche.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Sheffield.
David McGoldrick (Sheffield) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
In the minute 81, Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
Burnley will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sheffield.
In the minute 85, Sheffield push upfield and Ben Osborn gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Burnley defence.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Chris Wood.
Throw-in Sheffield.
Chris Wood is back on the pitch.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Free kick for Burnley in the half of Sheffield.
Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
Oliver Burke for Sheffield has been booked by Chris Kavanagh and receives a first yellow card.
